00025 #ifndef _PHYSICS_ODESLIDERJOINT_
00026 #define _PHYSICS_ODESLIDERJOINT_
00027 
00028 #include <physics/physics>
00029 #include <physics/SliderJoint>
00030 #include <physics/ODEJoint>
00031 
00032 
00033 namespace physics {
00034 
00035 
00036 class ODESliderJoint : public SliderJoint, public ODEJoint
00037 {
00038 public:
00039   ODESliderJoint();
00040   virtual ~ODESliderJoint();
00041 
00042   virtual String className() const { return String("ODESliderJoint"); }
00043   virtual Object& clone() const { return *NewNamedObj(className()) ODESliderJoint(); }
00044 
00045   virtual void    setAxis(const Vector3& v); ///< body1 relative
00046   virtual Vector3 getAxis() const;
00047   
00048   virtual Real    getPosition() const;
00049   virtual Real    getPositionRate() const;
00050 
00051   virtual void   setHighStop(Real pos); ///< upper joint stop 
00052   virtual void   setLowStop(Real pos);  ///< lower joint stop 
00053   virtual void   setStopRestitution(Real r); ///< 'bouncyness' of the stops (0..1)
00054 
00055   virtual void   setParameter(const String& name, Real value, Int dof=1); ///< "CFM","StopERP", "StopCFM" & "FudgeFactor"
00056 
00057 protected:
00058   virtual void onConstraintGroupAdd(ref<ConstraintGroup> g); ///< called by ConstraintGroup::addConstraint()
00059 
00060   virtual bool hasMotor(Int dof) const; ///< implemented by concrete ODEJoint classes to indicate which DOF's can have a Motor attached
00061   virtual void setMotorTargetVel(Int dof, Real vel); ///< implemented by concrete ODEJoint classes
00062   virtual void setMotorMaxForce(Int dof, Real force);///< implemented by concrete ODEJoint classes
00063 };
00064 
00065 
00066 } // physics

00068 #endif
